mapper.select: select * from admin where admin_account = #{adminAccount} and admin_password = #{adminPassword}
mapper.insert: insert into admin (admin_account, admin_password, admin_phone, admin_name)values(#{adminAccount}, #{adminPassword}, #{adminPhone}, #{adminName});
mapper.update: update admin set admin_password=#{adminPassword}, admin_phone=#{adminPhone}, admin_name=#{adminName} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from admin where admin_name like #{key}
